component.name: Rosalie's Mupen GUI
component.summary: An easy to use & cross-platform mupen64plus front-end written in C++ & Qt

description.p: Rosalie's Mupen GUI is an easy to use yet customizable mupen64plus front-end, allowing you to easily play N64 games.
